column6: 0.0#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2071127#2071127#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_13472# mi mthun pa ni zhes bya ba ni 'du shes med 'du shes med min  skye mched nas ci yang med pa'i skye mched la'o // /
column7: 0.010#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2638978#2638978#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_12896# bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa rnams ni bsam gtan gnyis pa'i nyer bsdogs kyis spong ba nas de bzhin du ci yang med pa'i skye mched pa rnams ni 'du shes med  'du shes med min skye mched kyi nyer bsngogs kyis spong ba'i bar du'o // /
column8: 0.010#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#827749#827749#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_10162# de bzhin du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched ma bskyed par 'du shes dang tshor  ba 'gog pa la snyoms par 'jug pa'i bar du mi nus so // /
column9: 0.011#TD4054E.TXT.r#1041277#1041277#TD4054E.TXT.r_8016# 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa'i gnas ni 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched do // /
column10: 0.011#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1785573#1785574#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_10750# 'di ni 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i las bstan pa'o // /
column11: 0.011#TD4094.2E.TXT.r#1910366#1910366#TD4094.2E.TXT.r_3359# 'di ni gya nom pa'o zhes de 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lam bsgoms nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams  dang skal ba mnyam par skyes so // /
column12: 0.011#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2392713#2392713#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9701# 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched dang ldan pa'i rnam par rig pa'o zhes bya bas ni sems bdun pa ston te / /
column13: 0.011#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2392737#2392737#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9703# bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa ni 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched na ni shin tu phra ba'i dmigs pa'i rnam par rig pas shin tu phra bas dmigs pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad do // /
column14: 0.011#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2393000#2393000#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9735# bsam gtan bzhi pa dang   'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched pa'i rnam par rig pa'o zhes bya bas ni sems bcu gsum pa ston to // /
column15: 0.011#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3095229#3095229#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_464;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_465# 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la ni nges par 'jig rten pa kho nas so // / +'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched dang ldan pa'i rgyu mtshan / /
column16: 0.011#TD4049E.TXT.r#2303199#2303199#TD4049E.TXT.r_2710;TD4049E.TXT.r_2711# chos shes pa dang  rjes su rtogs pa shes pa'i phyogs dang  de dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang  bsam gtan dang po nas ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi bar du'o // / +'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched ni 'du shes  kyi rgyu ba yongs su mi gsal ba'i phyir 'jig rten pa nyid de / /
column17: 0.011#TD4053E.TXT.r#2974253#2974253#TD4053E.TXT.r_1308# 'du shes med  'du shes med min skye mched pa rnams kyi dmigs pa'o // /
column18: 0.011#TD4054E.TXT.r#1008270#1008270#TD4054E.TXT.r_2887;TD4054E.TXT.r_2888# 'du shes med / / +'du shes med min skye mched pa rnams kyi dmigs pa'o // /
column19: 0.011#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#786367#786367#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_3253# nam mkha' dang  rnam par shes pa dang  ci yang med pa dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched dag ni rjes su 'brang ba'i gzugs med pa'i phyir phung po bzhi'i rang  bzhin te / /
column20: 0.012#TD4039E.TXT.r#1817260#1817260#TD4039E.TXT.r_227# 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur ba las ni rnam par grol ba'i gnas skabs su gdags te 'di ni skyo ba dang  'dod chags dang bral ba dang  rnam par grol ba rnams kyi rnam grangs gnyis pa'o // /
column21: 0.012#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3095220#3095220#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_463;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_464# ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi bar du yang de bzhin du ci rigs par rig par bya'o // / +'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la ni nges par 'jig rten pa kho nas so // /
column22: 0.012#TD4036E.TXT.r#30381#30381#TD4036E.TXT.r_4659;TD4036E.TXT.r_4660# rags pa nyid de yang ci yang med pa'i skye mched man chad kyis sa gong ma rnams la yang sa 'og ma man chad ches kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang  ches sdug bsngal bar spyod pa dang  ches yun THUNG DU GNAS PA DANG  ches  dman pa dang  ches tha chad yin par rig par bya'o // / +'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched 'ba' zhig zhi ba nyid yin te / /
column23: 0.013#TD4035E.TXT.r#181677#181677#TD4035E.TXT.r_9832;TD4035E.TXT.r_9833# 'du shes med pa'i sems can rnams ni de na gcig tu nges par rnam par shes  pa kun du 'byung ba med pa'i phyir na ma yin no // / +'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched ni kun du rgyu ba dang  kun du rgyu ba med pa gcig tu nges pa med pa'i phyir ro // /
column24: 0.013#TD4091E.TXT.r#753313#753313#TD4091E.TXT.r_10559;TD4091E.TXT.r_10560# 'du shes dman pa'i phyir 'du shes med / / +'du shes med min skye mched ces bya ba ste / /
column25: 0.013#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1488669#1488669#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_10302# 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched  rdzogs par byas te gnas so zhes bya ba'i bar gong du 'pho ba gcig pu ma gtogs pa mdo thams cad snga ma bzhin du brjod par bya'o // /
column26: 0.014#TD4035E.TXT.r#148943#148943#TD4035E.TXT.r_4206# yongs su gdung ba dang bcas pa dang  'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha dang  gzugs na spyod pa'i lha dang  gzugs med pa nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i  bar zhes byar mi rung ngo // /
column27: 0.014#TD4053E.TXT.r#2983879#2983879#TD4053E.TXT.r_2615# bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug pa'i phyir yid la byed pa rnam pa bdun ji lta ba bzhin du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar la snyoms par 'jug pa'i phyir yang ji ltar  mthun mthun du sbyar bar bya'o // /
column28: 0.014#TD4054E.TXT.r#1025287#1025287#TD4054E.TXT.r_5673# 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar la snyoms par 'jug pa'i phyir yang ji ltar mthun mthun du sbyar bar bya'o // /

column3: sdug bsngal ba'i zhing la gnas pa'i dbang du byas te / / +nad pa rnams la zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so // /
legs par smras pa la legs so zhes bya ba sbyin par byed pa yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni ngag gi dge ba'i chos bsags pa ston te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#197202#197216#TD4035E.TXT.r_12650;TD4035E.TXT.r_12651# de de ltar mnyam par gzhag nas mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams spang ba'i phyir  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi bsgom ste / /

column3: mdor bsdu  na legs par smras pa zhes bya ba ni kun nas nyon mongs pa'i gnyen po dang  rnam par byang ba dang mthun pa'i tshig go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#197211#197219#TD4035E.TXT.r_12651;TD4035E.TXT.r_12652# dran pa nye bar gzhag pa de dag nyid dang por byas nas byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi bar du bsgom pa'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#197291#197299#TD4035E.TXT.r_12659;TD4035E.TXT.r_12660;TD4035E.TXT.r_12661# gong ma'i cha dang mthun pa'i kun du sbyor ba rnams spang ba'i phyir yang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi bsgom pa nas / / +byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi bar du bsgom pa'o // /
column6: 0.025#TD4018E.TXT.r#3004918#3004918#TD4018E.TXT.r_168# rtog ge'i lta ba'i mtshan nyid kyi yang tshad ma dang  gzhal bas rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang  byang chub kyi phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun gyi chos 'byed cing snang ba'i tshul du bstan no // /
column7: 0.027#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#901586#901586#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1531# byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par byed pa'i rgyu byang chub kyi phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun gyi chos rgya chen po lang kar gshegs pa la sogs pa'i mdo sde de dang de dag  nas 'byung ba rnams la rtag tu spyan byed de / /
column8: 0.027#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#484514#484515#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_4584;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_4585# rnam par rtog pa la sogs pa dang BRAL BA ZHES BYA BA NI 'DI lta ste / / +sa bzhi pas byang chub kyi phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun gyi chos thob nas rnam par rtog pa dang  rnam par mi rtog  pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang bral ba ste / /

column3: de yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +sangs rgyas kyi bka' dang  dkon mchog gsum gyi yon tan la brten pa'i tshig la bya ba ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#197220#197228#TD4035E.TXT.r_12651;TD4035E.TXT.r_12652;TD4035E.TXT.r_12653# dran pa nye bar gzhag pa de dag nyid dang por byas nas byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi bar du bsgom pa'o // / +ji ltar na drang bor song ba yin zhe na / /

column3: de nyid kyi phyir smra na 'di nyid smra bar bya zhes  brjod do // / +rjod par byed pa ni yid la 'dzin pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#197229#197245#TD4035E.TXT.r_12653;TD4035E.TXT.r_12654# rgyun las bzlog pa'i phyogs su 'gro ba'i 'phags pa'i lam yan lag    brgyad pa skye zhing mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyang spong la / /

column3: tshig tu 'byin pa yang de dang 'dra'o // / +dga' ba'i sems bskyed nas zhes bya ba ni gyo med pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa dang  mchog tu dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems kyis zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#197245#197253#TD4035E.TXT.r_12654;TD4035E.TXT.r_12655# de rgyun las bzlog pa'i phyogs su 'gro ba'i lam der yang zhugs shing song ba'o // /

column3: bdag gis byas pa la ji ltar dga'  ba de bzhin du gzhan gyis byas pa la yang dga' bar byed do // / +bzod par byed ces bya ba ni lus dang ngag gis phyir gnod pa mi byed pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#197251#197262#TD4035E.TXT.r_12654;TD4035E.TXT.r_12655;TD4035E.TXT.r_12656# de rgyun las bzlog pa'i phyogs su 'gro ba'i lam der yang zhugs shing song ba'o // / +ji ltar na de'i mya ngan dang rims nad thams cad spangs pa yin zhe na / /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#197263#197270#TD4035E.TXT.r_12656;TD4035E.TXT.r_12657# bden pa mngon par rtogs ma thag tu tha  ma'i cha dang mthun pa'i kun du sbyor ba lnga yang spangs pa yin te / /

column3: dge ba byas pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed pas bsod nams tha dad pa skye bar 'gyur bar bstan pa'i phyir / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#197267#197279#TD4035E.TXT.r_12656;TD4035E.TXT.r_12657;TD4035E.TXT.r_12658;TD4035E.TXT.r_12659# bden pa mngon par rtogs ma thag tu tha  ma'i cha dang mthun pa'i kun du sbyor ba lnga yang spangs pa yin te / / +mya ngan lta bu'i gnod sems dang  rims nad lta bu'i 'dod pa'i 'dun pa spangs pa'o // /
column5: 0.028#TD4035E.TXT.r#195802#195803#TD4035E.TXT.r_12429;TD4035E.TXT.r_12430# ji ltar dran pa dang ldan pa yin zhe na / / +gong ma'i cha dang mthun pa'i kun du sbyor ba rnams spang bar bya ba'i phyir // /

column3: yongs su  sngo bar byed pa yin zhes smos so // / +smon lam chen po bcu sngon du 'gro ba'i yang dag pa'i smon lam rnams 'debs pa yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#197280#197290#TD4035E.TXT.r_12658;TD4035E.TXT.r_12659;TD4035E.TXT.r_12660# ji ltar na yang dag pa'i dran pa dang ldan pa yin zhe na / / +gong ma'i cha dang mthun pa'i kun du sbyor ba rnams spang ba'i phyir yang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi bsgom pa nas / /
column5: 0.027#TD4039E.TXT.r#1877128#1877128#TD4039E.TXT.r_7244# 'dun pa dang brtson 'grus la sogs pa bsgom pa la sbyor ba ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi 'grub par bya ba'i     // /

column3: dkon mchog mchod pa ni mdor bsdu na zang zing gi mchod pa dang  sgrub pa'i mchod pa ste / / +de'i phyir rnam pa thams cad ces smos so // /
column4: 0.025#TD4018E.TXT.r#3004918#3004918#TD4018E.TXT.r_168# rtog ge'i lta ba'i mtshan nyid kyi yang tshad ma dang  gzhal bas rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang  byang chub kyi phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun gyi chos 'byed cing snang ba'i tshul du bstan no // /
column5: 0.027#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#484514#484515#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_4584;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_4585# rnam par rtog pa la sogs pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste / / +sa bzhi pas byang chub kyi phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun gyi chos thob nas rnam par rtog pa dang  rnam par mi rtog  pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang bral ba ste / /
column6: 0.028#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#901586#901586#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1531# byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par byed pa'i rgyu byang chub kyi phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun gyi chos rgya chen po lang kar gshegs pa la sogs pa'i mdo sde de dang de dag  nas 'byung ba rnams la rtag tu spyan byed de / /

column3: mchod pa ngan pa  dgag pa'i phyir rgya chen po zhes smos te / / +byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis mchod pa ngan pa gtan mi bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#197298#197311#TD4035E.TXT.r_12660;TD4035E.TXT.r_12661;TD4035E.TXT.r_12662;TD4035E.TXT.r_12663# byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi bar du bsgom pa'o // / +ji ltar na de'i sems rnam par grol ba yin zhe na / /
column5: 0.020#TD4035E.TXT.r#196373#196373#TD4035E.TXT.r_12513;TD4035E.TXT.r_12514;TD4035E.TXT.r_12515# de yang gang zhe na / / +kun du sbyor ba thams cad las sems     // / +shin tu rnam par grol ba gang yin pa'o // /

column3: brtson zhing zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni / / +sbyin pa la sogs pa pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la sbyor bas bsdus pa'i dge ba ston to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#197308#197321#TD4035E.TXT.r_12662;TD4035E.TXT.r_12663;TD4035E.TXT.r_12664;TD4035E.TXT.r_12665# gong ma'i cha dang mthun pa'i kun du sbyor ba de dag spangs pas nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang  shes bya'i sgrib  pa ste / /
column5: 0.028#TD4087E.TXT.r#1572495#1572495#TD4087E.TXT.r_2103# de ma yin pa'i dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis kyang 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar shes te / /
column6: 0.028#TD4087E.TXT.r#1572552#1572552#TD4087E.TXT.r_2113# de ma yin pa'i dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis kyang 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su  'gyur bar shes te / /
column7: 0.028#TD4087E.TXT.r#1572798#1572798#TD4087E.TXT.r_2143# de ma yin pa'i dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis kyang nga la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar shes te / /
column8: 0.028#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1698711#1698711#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_112# gang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa / /

column3: bag yod par gnas pa yin zhes    bya bas ni brtson pa kho na ston to // / +tshogs kyi lam gyi gnas dge ba bstan pa'i phyir / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#197321#197332#TD4035E.TXT.r_12664;TD4035E.TXT.r_12665;TD4035E.TXT.r_12666;TD4035E.TXT.r_12667# de de ltar sems shin tu rnam par grol bas / / +de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur te / /
column5: 0.012#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1795564#1795564#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_12070# de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la sbyin pa sbyin par byed na gang zag so so yon gnas yin no // /
column6: 0.014#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1698741#1698742#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_118;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_119# btsun pa ma lags so / / +da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pa  'di lta bu'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa / /
column7: 0.015#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1745185#1745186#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_5888# ma 'ongs pa na skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya thub pa'i dus na sh'akya thub pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung bar 'gyur te / /
column8: 0.015#TD4087E.TXT.r#1558330#1558332#TD4087E.TXT.r_45;TD4087E.TXT.r_46# gal te khyim par 'dug cing khyim na gnas na ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhir rgyal ba zhes bya ba nas / / +rgyas par 'jig rten 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi  bar du 'gyur te / /
column9: 0.015#TD4014E.TXT.r#442149#442149#TD4014E.TXT.r_868# de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'di zhes bya bar 'gyur RO ZHES BYA BA NI de lta bu'i lung bstan pa thob par shog shig ces bya ba yin no // /
column10: 0.016#TD4087E.TXT.r#1573153#1573154#TD4087E.TXT.r_2185# bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur te / /
column11: 0.016#TD4015E.TXT.r#1972452#1972454#TD4015E.TXT.r_912;TD4015E.TXT.r_913;TD4015E.TXT.r_914# 'di'i dus su 'jig rten gyi khams tshe ge mo zhig tu / / +de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas / /
column12: 0.018#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#921211#921211#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3927# ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ba la  sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan par khong du chud pa'o // /
column13: 0.018#TD4087E.TXT.r#1572240#1572241#TD4087E.TXT.r_2072# gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur te / /
column14: 0.018#TD4087E.TXT.r#1574598#1574598#TD4087E.TXT.r_2358;TD4087E.TXT.r_2359# ci'i phyir skyes bu chen po'i mtshan dang ldan pa gnyis yod pa las gcig ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhir rgyal bar 'gyur la / / +gcig ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur zhe na / /
column15: 0.018#TD4087E.TXT.r#1574739#1574739#TD4087E.TXT.r_2371;TD4087E.TXT.r_2372# rgyu des na skyes bu chen po'i mtshan dang ldan ba gnyis yod pa las gcig ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhir rgyal bar 'gyur la / / +gcig ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro // /
column16: 0.019#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1742790#1742791#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_5685# ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes 'jig rten du mngon par grags par 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal to // /
column17: 0.019#TD4037E.TXT.r#1371294#1371295#TD4037E.TXT.r_7351;TD4037E.TXT.r_7352# de ltar bskul bas lus rnam par dbye ba shes pa tshad med pa mngon par sgrub pa dang  dbang bcu yang thob par 'gyur te / / +rgyas par mdo nyid  las ji skad 'byung ba bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column18: 0.020#TD4087E.TXT.r#1558264#1558264#TD4087E.TXT.r_39# 'jig rten 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bar du 'gyur te / /

column20: 0.020#TD4094.2E.TXT.r#1915703#1915703#TD4094.2E.TXT.r_4065# gang yang 'das pa'i dus na byung bar gyur pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag kyang chos nyid la bkur stir bya ba dang  bla mar bya ba  dang ; /
column21: 0.020#TD4025E.TXT.r#2167067#2167067#TD4025E.TXT.r_189# 'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang gyo bar mi mdzad / /
column22: 0.020#TD4094.2E.TXT.r#1917080#1917080#TD4094.2E.TXT.r_4251# goo ta ma len pa la dga' ba dang  len pas 'bags pa dang  len pa las kun du 'byung ba  dang nye bar len pa don du gnyer ba'i skye dgu las de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis chos rnams mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so // /
column23: 0.023#TD4087E.TXT.r#1564770#1564770#TD4087E.TXT.r_1020;TD4087E.TXT.r_1021# dad pas khyim nas khyim med par legs pa kho nar rab tu byung na ni /// / +'jig rten du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur te / /
column24: 0.024#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1642471#1642471#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_7809;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_7810# lhan cig gnyis min sangs rgyas bzhin // / +mdo las gang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gnyis snga phyi med par 'jig rten du 'byung ba ni gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med de / /
