column5: 0.019#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2707316#2707317#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_712;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_713# bde ba'i tshor ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems yongs su gyur nas sdug bsngal ba dang mtshungs par ldan par 'gyur ba dang  dge ba'i sems yongs su gyur nas nyon mongs pa can du 'gyur ba dang  'dod pa'i don rnams la re ba dang ldan pa'i sems  yongs su gyur pa ni re ba 'bras bu med par gyur pa de ni sems rga ba zhes bya'o // / +nyin mtshan de dang de dag 'das pa dang skad cig dang thang cig dang yud tsam de dang de dag 'das pas tshe 'gribs pa'i rim gyis thams cad kyi thams cad du yongs su zad par gyur pa ni tshe rga ba zhes  bya'o ; / /
column6: 0.019#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2707082#2707084#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_687# dmigs pa de dang nges nyin mtshan de dang de    dag 'das pa dang  skad cig dang thang cig yud tsam de dang de dag 'das pas sems bde ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa'am / /
column7: 0.019#TD4035E.TXT.r#171651#171651#TD4035E.TXT.r_8229# nyin mtshan de dang de dag dang  skad cig dang  thang cig dang  yud tsam de dang de dag las 'das pa las ni rnam pa du ma mang po rnam pa sna tshogs su  gzhan skye zhing gzhan 'gag par so sor rtog go // /
column8: 0.020#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1717588#1717588#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_2689# de bzhin du sems zhes bya ba dang  yid ces bya ba dang  rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de dag dang  de dag ni nyin mtshan du 'jig cing de dang de dag skad cig thang cig yud tsam du 'jig cing rnam pa du ma mang po gzhan skye zhing skye'o // /
column9: 0.022#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1717552#1717552#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_2683# bya ba de dang de dag ni nyin mtshan du 'jig cing de dang de dag tu skad cig thang cig yud tsam du 'jig cing rnam pa du ma mang po skye zhing skye'o // /

column3: 'di dang phyi ma la bdag dang  gzhan dag gi bde ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'i phyir dang  phyi ma la bdag nyid la gyog 'khor dang ldan pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba'i phyir / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#205622#205635#TD4035E.TXT.r_14033;TD4035E.TXT.r_14034;TD4035E.TXT.r_14035# sems ni nyin mtshan dang  skad cig thang cig yud tsam de dang de dag 'das pa rnam pa du ma mang po sna tshogs gzhan skye ba ni skye la / /

column3: 'di dang phyi ma la bde  ba dang ; / +brtson 'grus dang ldan pa ni / / +tshe 'di nyid la brtson 'grus brtsams pas sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams dang  mi 'dres pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba'i phyir dang  phyi ma la spro ba chen po'i rgyur 'gyur ba'i phyir dang  phyi ma la bde ba dang  bsam gtan  dang ldan pa ni / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#205636#205643#TD4035E.TXT.r_14035;TD4035E.TXT.r_14036# de ltar na sems kyi ngo bo nyid kyi lus ni nyon mongs  pa can gyi bdag nyid yin pas yongs su grub pa ma yin no // /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#205643#205652#TD4035E.TXT.r_14035;TD4035E.TXT.r_14036;TD4035E.TXT.r_14037# de ltar na sems kyi ngo bo nyid kyi lus ni nyon mongs  pa can gyi bdag nyid yin pas yongs su grub pa ma yin no // / +de yang ma 'ongs pa'i dus la brten nas bag la nyal dang bcas par rnam par shes pa'i gnas bzhi po de dag la gnas te / /
column6: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#205653#205660#TD4035E.TXT.r_14036;TD4035E.TXT.r_14037;TD4035E.TXT.r_14038# de yang ma 'ongs pa'i dus la brten nas bag la nyal dang bcas par rnam par shes pa'i gnas bzhi po de dag la gnas te / / +yang skye zhing 'gro ba dang  phyir 'ong ba'i skal ba can yin no // /

column3: 'di nyid la bde ba la reg pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba'i phyir dang  phyi ma la rnam par dag pa'i lhar skye ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'i phyir / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#205661#205669#TD4035E.TXT.r_14037;TD4035E.TXT.r_14038;TD4035E.TXT.r_14039# yang skye zhing 'gro ba dang  phyir 'ong ba'i skal ba can yin no // / +de la gal te  mkhas pa mtshan nyid bzhi po 'di dag gis 'das pa dang  da ltar byung ba dang  ma 'ongs pa'i dus la brten te / /

column3: gnyi ga bde ba dang  shes rab dang ldan pa ni / / +tshe 'di la de dang de dag la mkhas pa skyed pa'i phyir dang  phyi  ma la shes rab kyi khyad par gyi rgyur 'gyur ba'i phyir / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#205670#205683#TD4035E.TXT.r_14038;TD4035E.TXT.r_14039;TD4035E.TXT.r_14040;TD4035E.TXT.r_14041# de la gal te  mkhas pa mtshan nyid bzhi po 'di dag gis 'das pa dang  da ltar byung ba dang  ma 'ongs pa'i dus la brten te / / +sems yang dag pa ci lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes nas / /

column3: gnyi gar bde ba ste / / +de ltar na tshul khrims rnam pa bzhi ni / / +pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis bsdus te / / +ci rigs par sbyar ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#205684#205693#TD4035E.TXT.r_14041;TD4035E.TXT.r_14042;TD4035E.TXT.r_14043# sems kyang grol bar byed pa de ni 'jig tshogs thams cad las rgal te / / +pha rol du son nas thang la gnas pa'i bram ze yin no // /

column3: bdag dang pha rol rnams la gnyi gar phan 'dogs pas na / / +'di dang phyi ma  la bde ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#205692#205701#TD4035E.TXT.r_14042;TD4035E.TXT.r_14043;TD4035E.TXT.r_14044;TD4035E.TXT.r_14045# pha rol du son nas thang la gnas pa'i bram ze yin no // / +bshad pa 'di'i mdor bstan pa ni / /

column3: nyes pa rnam pa bcu'i gnyen por gyur pas na / / +rnam par dag pa ste / / +rnam pa bcu ni nyes pa rnam pa bcu'o / / +bsam pa nyams pas na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#205700#205709#TD4035E.TXT.r_14045# bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i dus yun ring po nas sems can kun nas nyon  mongs pa can byed pa po med pa yin par bstan pa dang  da ltar byung ba'i dus na skad cig pa dang  rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba yin la / /

column3: yang dag par len pa nyams pa'i nyes pa'o // / +de'i gnyen por dge sbyong gi tshul 'dod pa nas / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#205710#205718#TD4035E.TXT.r_14045;TD4035E.TXT.r_14046# bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i dus yun ring po nas sems can kun nas nyon  mongs pa can byed pa po med pa yin par bstan pa dang  da ltar byung ba'i dus na skad cig pa dang  rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba yin la / /

column3: tha ma rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod pa la thug pa rnams smos so // / +bslab pa la sbyor ba'i nyes pa ni / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#205719#205726#TD4035E.TXT.r_14046;TD4035E.TXT.r_14047;TD4035E.TXT.r_14048# ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bag med pa dang  bag yod pas byas pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa dang  rnam par byang ba bstan te / /

column3: de bzhin gshegs pas bslab pa'i gzhi bcas pa rnams la gus par mi byed pas na / / +de'i phyir ha cang zhum pa ma yin pa zhes smos te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#205727#205735#TD4035E.TXT.r_14047;TD4035E.TXT.r_14048;TD4035E.TXT.r_14049;TD4035E.TXT.r_14050;TD4035E.TXT.r_14051# de ni  'dir mdor bstan pa yin par rig par bya'o // / +'jig rten 'di ni gang gis bsgribs // / +'di ni gang gis mi gsal bgyis // /

column3: de nyid ni    'gal bar byas pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas rnam par 'grel to // / +bslab pa ni gzhi ma bcas pa'i rjes su 'jug pa'i nyes pa yin pas na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#205734#205746#TD4035E.TXT.r_14049;TD4035E.TXT.r_14050;TD4035E.TXT.r_14051;TD4035E.TXT.r_14052;TD4035E.TXT.r_14053;TD4035E.TXT.r_14054# 'di ni gang gis mi gsal bgyis // / +bsgos zhes bgyis ba ci la bgyi // / +de yi 'jigs chen gang zhig lags // /

column3: ha cang thal ba nyid do // / +nyes pa de gnyi ga'i gnyen por / / +ji ltar bcas pa rnams la yang dag par slob  pas na rnam par dag pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#205747#205756#TD4035E.TXT.r_14053;TD4035E.TXT.r_14054;TD4035E.TXT.r_14055;TD4035E.TXT.r_14056;TD4035E.TXT.r_14057# bag med phyir ni gsal ma yin // / +rtog pas bsgos zhes nga smra ste // /

column3: le lo'i nyes pas nyams par 'gyur ba de'i gnyen po le lo med pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#205757#205773#TD4035E.TXT.r_14056;TD4035E.TXT.r_14057;TD4035E.TXT.r_14058;TD4035E.TXT.r_14059;TD4035E.TXT.r_14060;TD4035E.TXT.r_14061# rgyun rnams kun nas 'dzag pa yi // / +rgyun rnams bzlog pa gang zhig lags // /

column3: le lo dang bral ba ni / / +nyin mtshan du dge ba'i phyogs la mngon par brtson pa zhes bya bas bstan to // /
bag med pa'i  nyes pa'i gnyen por ni / / +bag yod pas yongs su zin pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#205774#205781#TD4035E.TXT.r_14059;TD4035E.TXT.r_14060;TD4035E.TXT.r_14061;TD4035E.TXT.r_14062;TD4035E.TXT.r_14063# rgyun ni gang gis dgag par bgyi // / +'jig rten rgyun ni gang yin pa // / +de dag    bzlog par dran pa ste // /

column3: bstan pa'i nyes pa ni / / +rnyed pa dang  bkur sti dang  skye ba'i khyad par la brten pa'i phyir te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#205782#205789#TD4035E.TXT.r_14062;TD4035E.TXT.r_14063;TD4035E.TXT.r_14064;TD4035E.TXT.r_14065;TD4035E.TXT.r_14066# rgyun rnams sdom par bshad bya na // / +shes rab kyis ni dgag par bya // /

column3: de'i gnyen por smon la ma legs par btab pa zhes bya ba  la sogs pa smos so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#205790#205798#TD4035E.TXT.r_14065;TD4035E.TXT.r_14066;TD4035E.TXT.r_14067;TD4035E.TXT.r_14068;TD4035E.TXT.r_14069# ming dang gzugs ni rnam kun du // / +de ni gang du 'gag 'gyur ba // /

column3: gzhan dag 'dun par mi byed pa'i nyes pa de'i gnyen por ni / / +cho ga phun sum tshogs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#205797#205809#TD4035E.TXT.r_14067;TD4035E.TXT.r_14068;TD4035E.TXT.r_14069;TD4035E.TXT.r_14070;TD4035E.TXT.r_14071;TD4035E.TXT.r_14072# zhu na de ni bdag la gsungs // / +shes rab dang ni dran pa dang / / +ming  dang gzugs ni rnam kun du // /

column3: log par 'tsho ba'i nyes pa de'i gnyen por ni / / +'tsho ba phun sum tshogs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa  smos so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#205808#205819#TD4035E.TXT.r_14071;TD4035E.TXT.r_14072;TD4035E.TXT.r_14073;TD4035E.TXT.r_14074# der ni de yang 'gag par 'gyur // / +dran pa spyod pa'i rnam par shes // /

column3: mtha' gnyis su ltung ba'i nyes pa de'i gnyen por ni / / +mtha' gnyis rnam par spangs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#205818#205827#TD4035E.TXT.r_14073;TD4035E.TXT.r_14074;TD4035E.TXT.r_14075;TD4035E.TXT.r_14076;TD4035E.TXT.r_14077# ji ltar 'jug 'gyur zhu lags na // / +ji bzhin the tshom ma mchis par // /

column3: mchog tu 'dzin pa'i nyes pa de'i gnyen por ni / / +nges par 'byin pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#205828#205836#TD4035E.TXT.r_14076;TD4035E.TXT.r_14077;TD4035E.TXT.r_14078;TD4035E.TXT.r_14079;TD4035E.TXT.r_14080# nang dang phyi  yi tshor ba la // / +mngon par dga' bar mi byed na // / +de ltar dran pa spyod pa yi // /

column3: nyams  par byed pa de'i nyes pa ni / / +bslab pa las 'gal bar byed pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#205835#205844#TD4035E.TXT.r_14078;TD4035E.TXT.r_14079;TD4035E.TXT.r_14080;TD4035E.TXT.r_14081;TD4035E.TXT.r_14082# de ltar dran pa spyod pa yi // / +rnam par shes pa 'jug par 'gyur // / +gang dag legs gsungs chos can dang / /

column3: de'i gnyen por ni / / +ma nyams pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so // / +tshul khrims kyi phung po chen po ni / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#205845#205852#TD4035E.TXT.r_14081;TD4035E.TXT.r_14082;TD4035E.TXT.r_14083;TD4035E.TXT.r_14084# gang dag slob pa tha dad pa // / +de dag nang nas 'grus pa'i spyod // /

column3: yangs shing rgya che la bsod nams che ba'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#205853#205861#TD4035E.TXT.r_14083;TD4035E.TXT.r_14084;TD4035E.TXT.r_14085;TD4035E.TXT.r_14086;TD4035E.TXT.r_14087# zhu na bzod ldan bdag la gsungs // / +'dod pa rnams la chags med cing // /

column3: byang chub chen po'i 'bras bu  bskyed pa ni / / +'bras bu che ba'i phyir te / / +de gnyis ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa rnam par 'grel to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#205860#205872#TD4035E.TXT.r_14085;TD4035E.TXT.r_14086;TD4035E.TXT.r_14087;TD4035E.TXT.r_14088# yid kyis rnyog pa med par byed // / +chos rnams kun la mkhas pa dang / / +dran pas dge slong kun du rgyu // /

column3: byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa'i tshul khrims la slob pa'i phan yon / / +nyan thos la sogs pa dang thun mong ma yin pa bstan te /// /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#205873#205882#TD4035E.TXT.r_14088;TD4035E.TXT.r_14089;TD4035E.TXT.r_14090;TD4035E.TXT.r_14091# zhes bya ba ni pha rol du sgrol ba las ma pham pas zhus pa yin no // / +'jig rten ni gsum ste / /

column3: de la slob pas ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dgongs par 'gyur gyi nyan thos kyi sdom pa la slob pa ma yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#205883#205893#TD4035E.TXT.r_14090;TD4035E.TXT.r_14091;TD4035E.TXT.r_14092# 'dod pa'i 'jig rten dang   gzugs kyi 'jig rten dang  gzugs med pa'i 'jig rten no // / +don gyi skabs 'di ni rab tu byung ba'i 'jig rten dang  khyim pa'i 'jig rten las dgongs so // /

column3: 'chi ba'i tshe 'di nas shi 'phos nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang phrad pa yid la byed pas 'chi ba'i  'jigs pa las 'das pa'i phyir mchog tu dga' ba chen po 'thob po // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#205889#205901#TD4035E.TXT.r_14091;TD4035E.TXT.r_14092;TD4035E.TXT.r_14093;TD4035E.TXT.r_14094# don gyi skabs 'di ni rab tu byung ba'i 'jig rten dang  khyim pa'i 'jig rten las dgongs so // /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#205901#205915#TD4035E.TXT.r_14093;TD4035E.TXT.r_14094;TD4035E.TXT.r_14095# nyes par bshad pa'i chos can rnams dang   legs par gsungs pa'i chos can rnams so // / +de la nyes par bshad pa'i chos can gang yin pa de dag ni ma rig pas bsgribs so // /
column6: 0.017#TD4035E.TXT.r#204145#204147#TD4035E.TXT.r_13793;TD4035E.TXT.r_13794# de la gang dag dge sbyong du 'gyur bar 'dod pas tshangs par spyod pa tshol bar byed pa de dag ni legs par gsungs pa'i chos can rnams dang  nyes par bshad pa'i  chos can rnams so // /
column7: 0.022#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2611215#2611216#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_9364# yongs su nyams pa'i chos can dang  yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba'i chos can dang  'chi bar sems pa'i chos can dang  rjes su bsrung ba'i chos can dang  gnas pa las mi bskyod ba  dang  rtogs pa'i skal ba can dang  mi gyo ba'i chos can dang  shes rab kyis rnam par grol ba dang  gnyi ga'i cha las rnam par grol ba ste / /
column8: 0.022#TD4095E.TXT.r#97223#97225#TD4095E.TXT.r_6609;TD4095E.TXT.r_6610;TD4095E.TXT.r_6611;TD4095E.TXT.r_6612# dgra bcom drug 'dod // / +yongs su nyams pa'i chos can dang / / +'chi bar sems pa'i chos can dang / /
column9: 0.022#TD4097E.TXT.r#2221429#2221431#TD4097E.TXT.r_2416;TD4097E.TXT.r_2417# de nyid rnam pa drug tu 'gyur te / / +yongs su nyams pa'i chos can dang  'chi bar sems pa'i chos can dang  rjes su bsrung ba'i  chos can dang  gnas pa la mi gyo ba dang  rab tu rtogs par byed pa'i skal ba can dang  mi gyo ba'i chos can no // /
column10: 0.023#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2608742#2608742#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_9067;TD4092.2E.TXT.r_9068# 'di la yongs su nyams pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin yod pas na yongs su nyams pa'i  chos can no // / +'che bar sems pa'i chos can ni bdag nyid 'chi bar sems pa'i chos can no // /
column11: 0.023#TD4049E.TXT.r#2306505#2306509#TD4049E.TXT.r_3267# dad pas mos pa dang  mthong bas thob pa dang  lus kyis mngon du byed pa dang  shes rab kyis rnam par grol ba dang  gnyi ga'i cha las rnam par grol ba dang  rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa  dang  rgyun tu zhugs pa dang  lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa dang  lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang  phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa dang  phyir mi 'ong ba dang  dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu mngon du bya ba'i phyir zhugs  pa dang  dgra bcom pa dang  re ltar thogs na srid pa lan bdun pa dang  rigs nas rigs su skye ba dang  bar chad gcig pa dang  bar mdor yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang  skyes nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang  mngon par 'du byed pa med par  yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang  mngon par 'du byed pa dang bcas pas mya ngan las 'da' ba dang  gong du 'pho ba dang  dgra bcom pa yongs su nyams pa'i chos can dang  bdag gcod pa'i chos can dang  rjes su bsrung ba'i chos can dang  gnas pa las mi  gyo ba'i chos can dang  rab tu rtogs pa'i 'os su gyur pa dang  mi 'khrugs pa'i chos can gyi gang zag go // /
column12: 0.027#TD4090.2E.TXT.r#1062478#1062479#TD4090.2E.TXT.r_1643# yongs su nyams pa'i chos can dang  'chi bar sems pa'i chos can dang  rjes su srung ba'i chos can dang  gnas pa las mi bskyod pa dang  rtogs pa'i skal ba can dang  mi gyo ba'i chos can no // /
column13: 0.027#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2603393#2603394#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_8428# yongs su nyams pa'i chos can dang  'chi bar sems pa'i chos can dang  rjes su srung ba'i chos can dang  gnas     // /
column14: 0.027#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2603618#2603619#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_8457# yongs su nyams pa'i chos can la sogs pa'i rigs kyi bye brag gis drug go  zhes bya ba ni de nyid yongs su nyams pa'i chos can dang  'chi bar sems pa'i chos can dang  rjes su srung ba'i chos can dang  gnas pa las mi gyo ba dang  rtogs pa'i skal ba can dang  mi gyo ba'i chos can zhes bya ba yin no // /
column15: 0.027#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2045280#2045281#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_9724# yongs su nyams pa'i chos can dang  'chi bar sems pa'i chos can dang  rjes su bsrungs pa'i chos can dang  gnas pa las mi gyo ba dang   rtogs pa'i skal ba can dang  mi gyo ba'i chos can dang  yongs su mi nyam pa'i chos can dang  shes rab kyis rnam par grol ba dang  gnyi ga'i cha las rnam par grol ba ste / /
column16: 0.027#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2045464#2045464#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_9745# rigs kyi bye brag gis drug go zhes bya ba ni yongs su nyams pa'i chos can dang  'chi bar sems pa'i chos can dang  rjes su bsrungs pa'i chos can dang  gnas pa las mi gyo ba dang  rtogs pa'i skal ba can dang  ma gyo ba'i chos can zhes bya ba  yin no // /
column17: 0.027#TD4094.2E.TXT.r#1892825#1892826#TD4094.2E.TXT.r_1096# yongs su nyams pa'i chos can dang  'chi bar sems pa'i chos can dang  rjes  su bsrung ba'i chos can dang  gnas pa las mi skyo ba dang  rtogs pa'i skal ba can dang  mi gyo ba'i chos can dang  shes rab kyis rnam par grol ba dang  phyogs gcig las rnam par grol ba dang  gnyi ga'i cha las rnam par grol ba ste / /
column18: 0.027#TD4094.2E.TXT.r#1894360#1894361#TD4094.2E.TXT.r_1307# yongs su nyams pa'i chos can dang  'chi bar sems pa'i chos can dang  rjes su srung ba'i chos can dang  gnas pa las mi bskyod ba dang  rtogs pa'i  skal ba can dang  mi gyo ba'i chos can no zhes gsungs so // /
column19: 0.027#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2723764#2723765#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_3048# de dag ni mdo las sems can thams cad bsad pa ma yin pa  zhes bya ba dang  'byung ba'i chos can gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni 'gog pa'i chos can yin no zhes bya ba dang  bdag kyang med la bdag gi yang med de / /

column3: phyi ma la sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad pa ni phan yon gsum pa'o // /
pha rol tu phyin pa bsdus pa'i bsod nams yongs su 'dzin pa'i phyir bzhi pa'o // / +gtan  du ba'i tshul khrims yin pas chos nyid kyi tshul khrims 'thob pa'i phyir lnga pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#205916#205923#TD4035E.TXT.r_14095;TD4035E.TXT.r_14096# legs par gsungs pa'i chos can gang yin pa de dag ni rig pa'i gsal ba'i skabs yod mod kyi bag med pas mi gsal lo // /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#205924#205932#TD4035E.TXT.r_14096;TD4035E.TXT.r_14097;TD4035E.TXT.r_14098# khyim pa  gos dkar po gyon pa tha dad pa rnams ni rtog pas bsgos pa yin no // / +rtog pa de yang rnam pa gsum du rig par bya ste / /

column3: rnam pa re re yang tshul khrims rnam pa gsum du bsdu ba ni / / +de thams cad ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims dang zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#205933#205949#TD4035E.TXT.r_14098;TD4035E.TXT.r_14099;TD4035E.TXT.r_14100;TD4035E.TXT.r_14101;TD4035E.TXT.r_14102# bsnyad pa'i gzhi gsum po dag la yang rtog pa zhes bya'o // / +tha snyad bzhi brjod pa la yang rtog pa zhes bya'o // /

column3: ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims rnam pa  gsum las mi nyung mi mang zhes rgol ba'i lan gyi sgo nas tshul khrims rnam pa gsum du gzhag par bstan pa'i phyir gsum zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#205949#205964#TD4035E.TXT.r_14102;TD4035E.TXT.r_14103;TD4035E.TXT.r_14104;TD4035E.TXT.r_14105;TD4035E.TXT.r_14106# de la 'das pa dang  ma 'ongs pa dang  da ltar byung ba'i bsnyad pa'i gzhi rnams las / /

column3: sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyis ni sems gnas pa bstan te / / +kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i chos kyi bde ba la gnas pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#205965#205972#TD4035E.TXT.r_14105;TD4035E.TXT.r_14106;TD4035E.TXT.r_14107# de ni de dag gi sgo bar byed pa zhes bya'o // / +de ltar snga ma'i rtog pa dang  phyi ma'i bsgo ba ni phal cher khyim pa rnams la snang ste / /

column3: lus  dang sems kyi mngon par 'dus byas pa yang de dang 'dra'o // / +dge ba sdud pa'i tshul khrims kyis ni / / +sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su smin pa'i sgo nas bdag la phan pa bsgrub bo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#205973#205985#TD4035E.TXT.r_14106;TD4035E.TXT.r_14107;TD4035E.TXT.r_14108# de ltar snga ma'i rtog pa dang  phyi ma'i bsgo ba ni phal cher khyim pa rnams la snang ste / / +de lta bas na de dag ni rtog pas bsgos pa zhes bya'o // /

column3: sems can gyi don bya ba'i tshul khrims kyi sgo ste / / +sems can yongs su smin  par byed pa'i sgo nas ni gzhan la phan bsod nams che ba'i phyir sems dpa'i bya ba ni 'di dag tu zad de 'di lta ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#205984#205999#TD4035E.TXT.r_14108;TD4035E.TXT.r_14109# de la nyes par bshad pa'i chos can ma rig pas bsgribs pa gang dag yin pa dang  legs  par gsungs pa'i chos can bag med pa gang dag yin pa dang  khyim pa rtog pas bsgos pa gang dag yin pa de dag ni tshe 'di la sdug bsngal gyi rgyu yin bzhin du / /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#206000#206007#TD4035E.TXT.r_14108;TD4035E.TXT.r_14109# de la nyes par bshad pa'i chos can ma rig pas bsgribs pa gang dag yin pa dang  legs  par gsungs pa'i chos can bag med pa gang dag yin pa dang  khyim pa rtog pas bsgos pa gang dag yin pa de dag ni tshe 'di la sdug bsngal gyi rgyu yin bzhin du / / +sdug bsngal gyi rgyu las sdug bsngal gyi rgyur yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ci yang mi shes bas sdug bsngal gyi rgyu  la mngon par dga' ba'i ngo bor gnas te / /

column3: bdag nyid kyi snod du gyur par bya ba dang gnyi ga la phan par bsgrub pa'o // / +byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kye le'u rgya cher 'grel pa slob dpon rgyal ba'i sras kyis mdzad  pa rdzogs so //// /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#206008#206016#TD4035E.TXT.r_14109;TD4035E.TXT.r_14110;TD4035E.TXT.r_14111# sdug bsngal gyi rgyu las sdug bsngal gyi rgyur yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ci yang mi shes bas sdug bsngal gyi rgyu  la mngon par dga' ba'i ngo bor gnas te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#206016#206025#TD4035E.TXT.r_14110;TD4035E.TXT.r_14111;TD4035E.TXT.r_14112# rgyu des phyi ma la de dag gi sdug bsngal skye ba gang yin pa de ni / / +shin tu 'jigs pa chen po mi bzad pa yin no // /
